title: Asia Eyes Cautious Open as US Stocks Tread Water: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities were set for a mixed start as a lackluster day on Wall Street weighed on tech stocks and bonds and halted a rebound in Bitcoin ahead of next week’s Federal Reserve decision.
content: (Bloomberg) Asian equities were set for a mixed start as a lackluster day on Wall Street weighed on tech stocks and bonds and halted a rebound in Bitcoin ahead of next weeks Federal Reserve decision.… [+4871 chars]
